............................................................................... 171 Contact Information ................................................................. 184 Foreword As we go about our daily lives, we often experience stress, tension, and physical discomfort that can take a toll on our minds, bodies, and souls. In order to achieve true wellness, it is important to address these issues in a holistic way that integrates the mind, body, and soul. One powerful tool for achieving this kind of holistic healing is massage therapy. With the right techniques and a skilled practitioner, massage therapy can be a transformative experience that helps you release physical tension, calm your mind, and restore your inner balance. In this book, Heal Your Mind, Body, and Soul with Massage Therapy, Katherine E. Smith L.M.T shares her deep knowledge and experience as a licensed massage therapist to guide you on a journey toward greater wellness and vitality.
